title: Pear almond tart
ingredients: ['1 teaspoon cornflour', '1 tablespoon caster sugar, divided', '50ml full fat milk', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 egg yolks', '1 teaspoon butter', '60g ground almonds', '1 teaspoon cornflour', '60g icing sugar', '60g butter, softened', '1 egg', '1 sweet pastry sheet, rolled', '4 large pears, sliced']
